Pied 350. New slab, purchased it in a collection of t206s I found last year that the guy had for 50 plus years. Sold the Johnson port from the collection on here a few weeks ago  Measures correct, does have mk on back. I'll be happy to email pics [url]norwoodclassics@gmail.com[/url].

$2550 shipped SOLD
